title: Workshop on Improving University Science Learning Through Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience using digital devices (smartphones)
context.additional_context: A science competency enhancement course for mid-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, utilizing smartphone-based digital technologies in PC-free environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% preparation completeness using digital content before experimental activities
Learners increase peer interaction frequency by at least three times per week using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners receive over 90% of instructor feedback within 24 hours through a digital feedback system
Learners secure at least two hours per week of self-directed learning time using mobile learning resources

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
